Package org.frogger.gameController

Class LevelPageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.frogger.gameController.LevelPageController
  • public class LevelPageController
extends java.lang.Object

    LevelPageController

    This class represents a controller to control the LevelPage Model, which includes buttons allowing user interaction and handles user input events.

    This class integrates the methods to allow different user interaction. The game allows player to choose a game level and start playing the game. The three buttons are three entries to the game-playing pages with "easy","medium","hard" levels.

    Since:
    25/11/2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pinyuan Feng (scypf1)
    See Also:
    LevelPage
